left.text: when i was six years old i seriously wanted to be a lemming of the green-haired variety. i'm not sure why. i mean, they die. a LOT. but i thought they were awesome

right.text: so were you a builder, blocker, climber, or what?

left.text: yeah, i was a primordial incarnation of a pokemon furry.

right.text: i always felt bad doing that because they were going to get to the exit and you were KILLING THEM. denying their right to live and love

left.text: whenever i hit the number to win i'd usually just blow up anything else. blue green and peach pixels EVERYWHERE
